content.question: Which of the following most likely describes the fate of the Golkonda state after 1650 ?

choices.label: It expanded to control most of India.
It was conquered by the Portuguese.
It was conquered by the Mughal Empire.
It was conquered by the Ottoman Empire.

content.answer: It was conquered by the Mughal Empire.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
